title: 018: Pidgeot
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Pidgeot – the Father…really is just a big ass bird – also responsible for Magikarp genocide and is really what you hope to have when you first catch Pidgey…just admit it !

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), David, [Joe](https://twitter.com/Prnkt92)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Pidgeot_(Pok%C3%A9mon))
